channel.title: How could i make the option to view peoples ip's for each account 317 server?
channel.description: Hey i was wondering how i could get the connectedfrom folder so when someone joins the server i could see what the person's ip was because if they are multi-login then i want to see if it's true for proof. please help me thanks.i need to view there ip's under there accountinformation under characters. can someone please help me?
